1216540.name: Fishy2
1216540.description:
Fishy is a 3D platormer. you play as a fish very far from home . traveling through 10 worlds such as a jungle oasis to under water to the frozen tundra to inside a volcano to lastly to outer space by jumping platformers and solving puzzles. play through them all or play the stages you want with stage select. start from beginner levels, advance levels or expert levels. 150 levels total!

patch 3.7 edit fall animation adjust a few levels

patch 3.6

added og levels
extended death zone
edited advance 23

patch 3.0

Overhauled majority of stages
most levels were made shorter
added original fishy respawner and jump sound effect
